trans-unit.source: Holds the stack of client channel sinks that must be invoked during an asynchronous message response decoding.
trans-unit.target: 保存用戶端堆疊必須非同步訊息回應解碼期間叫用的通道。

trans-unit.source: This class makes a link demand.
trans-unit.target: 此類別可讓連結要求。

trans-unit.source: A security exception is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果立即呼叫者沒有基礎結構的權限，則會擲回安全性例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: See [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[連結要求](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ClientChannelSinkStack"></xref> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ClientChannelSinkStack"></xref>類別具有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ClientChannelSinkStack"></xref> class with the specified reply sink.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ClientChannelSinkStack"></xref>類別指定的回覆接收。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink"></xref> that the current stack can use to reply to messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink"> </xref>目前的堆疊可以用來回覆訊息。

trans-unit.source: Requests asynchronous processing of a method call on the sinks that are in the current sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的接收堆疊中的接收器上呼叫非同步方法的處理要求。

trans-unit.source: The AsyncProcessResponse method initializes asynchronous processing on the top sink in the current sink stack.
trans-unit.target: AsyncProcessResponse 方法初始化非同步處理程序中目前的接收堆疊最上方的接收。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The headers that are retrieved from the server response stream.
trans-unit.target: 從伺服器回應資料流擷取標頭。

trans-unit.source: The stream that is returning from the transport sink.
trans-unit.target: 傳回從傳輸接收資料流。

trans-unit.source: The current sink stack is empty.
trans-unit.target: 目前的接收堆疊是空的。

trans-unit.source: Dispatches the specified exception on the reply sink.
trans-unit.target: 將分派回覆接收上指定的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The DispatchException method dispatches the specified exception to the server through the reply sink that is specified in the constructor of the current sink stack.
trans-unit.target: DispatchException 方法分派透過目前的接收堆疊的建構函式中所指定回覆接收指定的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the current sink stack was created without a reply sink, the exception is not transmitted, and no new exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的接收堆疊回覆接收不建立，則不會傳輸例外狀況，並擲回新的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The exception to dispatch to the server.
trans-unit.target: 要發送至伺服器例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Dispatches the specified reply message on the reply sink.
trans-unit.target: 將分派回覆接收上指定的回覆訊息。

trans-unit.source: The DispatchReplyMessage method dispatches the specified message to the server through the reply sink that is specified in the constructor of the current sink stack.
trans-unit.target: DispatchReplyMessage 方法分派透過目前的接收堆疊的建構函式中所指定回覆接收指定的訊息。

trans-unit.source: If the current sink stack was created without a reply sink, the message is not transmitted, and no new exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的接收堆疊回覆接收不建立，則不會傳輸訊息，並擲回新的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage"></xref> to dispatch.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage"> </xref>來分派。

trans-unit.source: Pops the information that is associated with all the sinks from the sink stack up to and including the specified sink.
trans-unit.target: 會顯示從接收堆疊，並包含指定之接收的所有接收相關都聯的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The sink to remove and return from the sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 移除並從中接收堆疊傳回接收。

trans-unit.source: Information generated on the request side and associated with the specified sink.
trans-unit.target: 指定的接收與要求端上產生與資訊。

trans-unit.source: The current sink stack is empty, or the specified sink was never pushed onto the current stack.
trans-unit.target: 目前的接收堆疊是空的或指定的接收永遠不會推入至目前的堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Pushes the specified sink and information that is associated with it onto the sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 推入指定的接收和接收堆疊與它相關的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The information generated on the request side and specified in the `state` parameter is returned in the `state` parameter of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A> method on the corresponding sink.
trans-unit.target: 要求端上產生的資訊，並指定在`state`參數中傳回`state`參數<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A>對應接收上的方法。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A>

trans-unit.source: The sink to push onto the sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 要推送至接收堆疊接收。

trans-unit.source: Information generated on the request side that is needed on the response side.
trans-unit.target: 需要回應端要求端上產生的資訊。
